=!ConEmu has moved to conemu.github.io=
New official !ConEmu's project site is located here: [http://conemu.github.io/ conemu.github.io].

Since Google has declared [http://google-opensource.blogspot.ru/2015/03/farewell-to-google-code.html shutdown] of googlecode service. !ConEmu sources had already been moved to [https://github.com/Maximus5/ConEmu github.com] long ago and now the documentation will be located on [http://conemu.github.io/en/TableOfContents.html conemu.github.io] too.
